description.value:
Special: Daemon Wep, Felling (5), Power Field, Toxic (2), Unbalanced

Note: Weapon: Scyth?. Daemon WP 57 (Daemon of Nurgle), Bind Str 3. Att.: Accursed, Herald of Decay. Two-Handed, must be dedicate to Nurgle to wield. Best Craftsmanship version has Force Quality. When making charge/all out attack, can hit one additional enemy per 2 DoS on attack after first. Whilst drawn, all Explosive/Rending damage in 5m has Toxic(1) and Felling(1) Qualities.
